sentence:
…Their last win was in 2009, and there were a lot of naysayers out  there that while the UConn program has hit its peak, in 2023 in USA  Today there was a headline: ``UConn's dynasty is officially dead. That  is good news for women's college basketball.''

That is probably the ultimate bulletin board material for someone  like Geno Auriemma, if you know…

…NEWS; Blackman, John: NBC NEWS; Blackwill,       Sarah: NBC NEWS; Blair, Adam: INDEPENDENT TELEVISION NEWS       (ITN); Blair, Michael: SKY NEWS; Blair, Robert: NEW TANG       DYNASTY TV; Blakey, Leona: C-SPAN; Blanco, Hugo: AP-      BROADCAST; Blevins, David: SKY NEWS; Blitz, Matt: WAMU;       Blitzer, Wolf: CNN; Bloom, Daniel: CNN; Bluey, Robert: THE…

…our Nation's Capital contains towering and  iconic tributes to many of our Founding Fathers, we still have no  memorial for President Adams and his family.

Their remarkable dynasty of public service gave America not one but  two Presidents, a Secretary of State, an ambassador, an abolitionist,  and one of our most accomplished first ladies.

John Adams…
